com.javax0.jdsl.analyzers

Class SequenceAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javax0.jdsl.analyzers.SpaceIgnoringAnalyzer
      • com.javax0.jdsl.analyzers.SequenceAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Analyzer, Rule

    public class SequenceAnalyzer
extends SpaceIgnoringAnalyzer
    Implements an analyzer that accepts a code if the underlying analyzers accept the starts of the input a few times. The number of times the underlying analyzer is used can be between minRepetition to maxRepetition. The minimum for minRepetition is zero. The maxRepetition can be -1 for infinite number of allowed repetition, or some positive number that is not less than the minRepetition.

    maxRepetition can not be zero.

    Author:
    Peter Verhas
